benchmark_details.name: C-Plus Values
benchmark_details.overview: C-Plus Values is a new benchmark for aligning human values with large models, focusing on responsibility evaluation through multi-turn dialogues and story scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a more challenging dataset for evaluating the responsibility and ethical alignment of large language models (LLMs).

data.source: CValues dataset and expert-generated questions processed into multi-turn dialogues and stories.
data.format: Custom formats for dialogues and stories
data.annotation: Manual cleaning and verification by professionals.

methodology.calculation: Scores based on ethical standards evaluated by professionals.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate levels of ethical reasoning, emotional supportiveness, and social responsibility.
methodology.baseline_results: C-Plus benchmark shows improved detection of biases compared to previous benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through both expert scores and model performance metrics.
